section.title: Verifying the Image Service Installation
section.para: You can find the version of the installation by using the glance --version command:
The version number 2011.3 corresponds with the Diablo release.

Another verification at this point for the Glance installation working with Keystone is to issue a glance details command with the adminUser token. If you get no errors (and no response) it means that the token is accepted by Keystone and no images are yet loaded to Glance. If you get a "NotAuthorized" error, check your configuration files.
